name: Ninja Maker
description:
Ninja Maker is a 3D platformer game that you can create your own levels. Unleash your creativity and design the levels of your dreams!

Campaign:

Explore 5 worlds with 25 different levels. Find all the collectibles while fighting with various enemies. Be careful! At the end of every world, a boss fight waiting for you!

Create, Play and Share:

Build levels however you want! Add blocks, enemies, coins, obstacles, traps and others. Share your levels and play other levels created by players around the world.

Block-Based Programming:

Make your own gameplay by adding logic to blocks.

Gachapon

Collect coins to buy gachapons and unlock new characters.

Features

  • Fun combat: fight various enemies with your katana and shuriken
  • Discover secrets with an 360° interactive camera
  • 5 worlds and 25 different levels
  • Block-based programming
  • Level editor
